body:
This commit https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/commit/9eb42ff1089243928da623c33fb28eb07f910436#diff-5c755714d0649f91c00269ed3d88e19c removed files like pkg/api/v1/conversion_generated.go so now simply running `go get -v k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1` fails. While there are ways around this if your intent is building kubernetes, if you have a Go project that imports "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1", it fails to build because kubernetes fails to build using the standard Go toolchain. Again, there are workarounds but they are costly when dealing with CI.

Example:

``` sh
$ go version
go version go1.6.2 darwin/amd64
$ go get -v k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1
Fetching https://k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1?go-get=1
Parsing meta tags from https://k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1?go-get=1 (status code 200)
get "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1": found meta tag main.metaImport{Prefix:"k8s.io/kubernetes", VCS:"git", RepoRoot:"https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes"} at https://k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1?go-get=1
get "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1": verifying non-authoritative meta tag
Fetching https://k8s.io/kubernetes?go-get=1
Parsing meta tags from https://k8s.io/kubernetes?go-get=1 (status code 200)
k8s.io/kubernetes (download)
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/types
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/util/sets
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/auth/user
...
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1
# k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:248: undefined: autoConvert_api_PodStatusResult_To_v1_PodStatusResult
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:289: undefined: autoConvert_v1_PodStatusResult_To_api_PodStatusResult
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:304: undefined: autoConvert_api_PodTemplateSpec_To_v1_PodTemplateSpec
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:346: undefined: autoConvert_v1_PodTemplateSpec_To_api_PodTemplateSpec
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:363: undefined: autoConvert_api_PodSpec_To_v1_PodSpec
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:382: undefined: autoConvert_v1_PodSpec_To_api_PodSpec
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:405: undefined: autoConvert_api_Pod_To_v1_Pod
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:477: undefined: autoConvert_v1_Pod_To_api_Pod
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:493: undefined: autoConvert_api_ServiceSpec_To_v1_ServiceSpec
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:502: undefined: autoConvert_v1_Secret_To_api_Secret
src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/v1/conversion.go:502: too many errors
```

/cc @thockin

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: Build of Go projects importing kubernetes fail because of missing auto-generated code
